data.name: BorderCollie Blaster
data.detailed_description:
Kira is back! In this arcade style shoot ´em up you´ll encounter different foes, defeat big alien bosses and collect power-ups and new weapons to fight your way through exciting stages and find the holy bone Kira (the star of the game) is looking for.



- a digitized Border Collie
- 12 exciting stages (from from dusky city stages to the outer space to lava caves right into "Castle Canis" and its catacombs)
- two stages as hommage to an old classic game...
- hand-placed enemy waves
- bossfights at the end of each stage

- all the money from the game will be used for Kira!! (food, dog toys, vet bills etc.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Pentium®IV 1.5 GHz oder Athlon® XP 1500+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 100% DirectX® 9.0b kompatible 64 MB Grafikkarte und neuste Treiber
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Pentium®IV 1.5 GHz oder Athlon® XP 1500+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 100% DirectX® 9.0b kompatible 64 MB Grafikkarte und neuste Treiber
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
